Header.title: Upload. Detect. Protect.
Header.paragraph: Use AI to detect plant disease instantly from images

About.paragraph: This project focuses on advancing plant health monitoring by leveraging deep learning techniques for early and accurate disease detection. A powerful EfficientNet-based Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) has been designed to classify various plant diseases from leaf images with remarkable precision. The trained model is seamlessly integrated into a user-centric desktop application, offering an intuitive platform for real-time plant disease diagnosis. Users simply upload images of affected leaves and instantly receive detailed classification results. By facilitating timely detection and diagnosis, this tool empowers farmers and agricultural specialists to respond quickly to plant health threats, ultimately enhancing crop yield, minimizing losses, and supporting more sustainable agricultural practices.

Services.name: Environmental Impact Reduction
Services.text: Helps reduce the environmental impact by preventing disease spread.

Services.name: Sustainability in Agriculture
Services.text: Improves the sustainability of agriculture by minimizing pesticide use

Services.name: Farmer Decision Support
Services.text: Helps farmers make informed decisions to prevent crop damage.
